identity.name: E1
identity.philosophy: Fusion over Imitation. Emotion First. Content is King.

rules: Never use pure black (#000000). Use Slate-950.
Primary color (Violet) is for CTAs and Active states ONLY.
Use colored borders (Violet-500/30) for active inputs/cards instead of just glow.
Ensure text contrast: Slate-400 is the minimum for body text.

heading.usage: Page titles, Section headers, Card titles

structure.sidebar: Sticky summary of selection (Service, Provider, Price)
structure.main: Step content (Service Grid -> Provider List -> Calendar -> Form)

steps.card_style: Aspect-square or 4:3, Image background with gradient overlay, Title at bottom left
Horizontal card with Avatar (left), Info (middle), Availability (right)

Button.primary: bg-violet-600 hover:bg-violet-500 text-white rounded-full px-8 py-6 font-semibold shadow-lg shadow-violet-900/20 transition-all hover:scale-[1.02]
Button.secondary: bg-slate-800 hover:bg-slate-700 text-white rounded-full px-6 py-6 font-medium border border-slate-700

Card.base: bg-slate-900 border border-slate-800 hover:border-violet-500/50 transition-colors duration-300 rounded-2xl overflow-hidden group

Input.base: bg-slate-950 border-slate-800 focus:border-violet-500 focus:ring-violet-500/20 rounded-lg h-12

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. SETUP: Install 'lucide-react' and 'date-fns' if not present.
2. THEME: Ensure 'dark' class is applied to the root/html element. Use 'slate-950' as the global background.
3. FONTS: Import 'Manrope' and 'Inter' from Google Fonts in index.css.
4. LAYOUT: Build the 'BookingWizard' as the core feature. Use a 'StepProvider' context to manage state.
5. ANIMATION: Add 'framer-motion' for smooth step transitions (slide-in/fade-out).
6. LANGUAGE: Implement a simple toggle (EN/PT-BR) using a React Context or simple state for strings.
7. CRITICAL: Do not use default Shadcn card styles. Override with the 'Midnight Luxury' styles defined above.
8. ACCESSIBILITY: Ensure all inputs have labels and contrast ratios are met (Violet-600 on Slate-950 is good, but check text on Violet).
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI Slop': No generic centered layouts. Use asymmetry.
Spacing: Use p-8 or p-12 for sections. Don't cram content.
Micro-interactions: Buttons should scale slightly on hover. Inputs should glow on focus.
Glassmorphism: Use it sparingly for sticky headers or floating summaries.
Data-TestID: Add 'data-testid' to all interactive elements (e.g., 'booking-step-1-next').
